body.name: Dreamer Car Wedge Seat Cushion for Car Seat Driver/Passenger- Car Seat Cushions for Driving Improve Vision/Posture - Memory Foam Car Seat Cushion for Hip Pain Relief(Mesh Cover,Black)

features: Innovative Wedge Shape Car Seat Cushion: The car seat cushions for driving is designed in a wedge shape that features a front low and rear high design. The front low design allows for easy access to the brakes, so it doesn’t bother the action of legs, while the rear high design helps to raise the driver to improve vision.

Ultimate Dense and Slow Rebound Memory Foam Car Pillow: The car cushions for driving are made of slow rebound memory foam, which feels good to sink (just a bit) into this cushion and softens bumps in the road,especially suitable for those who suffered from lower back pain coccyx pain and butt pain. This foam is also durable and maintains its shape over time, providing comfort with long-lasting.

Universal Sized Car Pillow for Driving Seat: The portable car seat for travel is designed to fit most car seat dimensions, such as car/sport car/ truck/pickup truck/van/motorhome. It has a compact and lightweight design that makes it easy to install and remove. You can also take it with you when you travel.

3D Breathable Mesh Fabric: The seat cushion for car features a 3D breathable mesh fabric that allows air to circulate freely. This helps to avoid sweating and dissipate heat, making it ideal for use during hot weather.

Non-slip Rubber Bottom and Elastic Strap: The car seat cushions for short people have a non-slip rubber bottom and an elastic strap that keeps it in place. This ensures that the car cushion stays securely attached to the car seat, even during sudden movements or stops.

Invisible Zipper: The truck seat cushion come with an invisible zipper that allows you to easily remove the cover for cleaning. This makes it easy to maintain the driver seat cushion's cleanliness and hygiene.

1 Year Guarantee: If there is any product defect of your car seat pillow, do not hesitate to contact us for a free replacement or full refund. You do not need to worry about the after-sales problem.Kind reminder: To save space, the product has been compressed. After opening the package, please wait for three minutes for the product to regain its original shape.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introduce the perfect solution for comfortable driving - the Wedge Shape Car Seat Cushion!The wedge-shaped seat cushion for truck driver is developed based on regular seat cushions.A flaw with regular seat cushion is that it makes driving posture worse. And this wedge seat cushion just solves this flaw.This car seat cushions for driving are designed with your driving experience in mind, featuring a front low and rear high design. The front low design allows for easy access to the brakes, while the rear high design lifts the height for a wider field of vision.

Our memory foam car seat cushion is made of ultimate dense and slow rebound memory foam, which is soft and comfortable. And the memory foam of other seat cushion is hard, just like a wooden board.And what you need is a car seat pad that can release pressure and relieve pain, not a wooden board.

Heat and Weight Responsive Memory Foam Firmness for all memory foam products changes with temperature. Our travel seat cushion will be soften in warm and firm in cold temperatures. Room temperature is ideal for optimal performance.In the meantime, our cushion for car seat driver for comfort will provide less support with increasing weight. Non-slip Rubber Design Rubber bottom and elastic adjustable strap double keep your car seat pillows for driving tightly. Invisible zipper is Skin Friendly The cover of adult booster seat for car often contacts the skin , invisible zipper of the car booster seat for short drivers can avoid our skin from getting scratched. In the meanwhile,the ventilate mesh of the auto seat cushion can avoid overheating of our body. Keeps Clean, Stays Fresh The cover of the seat cushions for cars is washable, which makes the car cushions for driving for short people easy to clean. In daily use, remove the cover, then machine wash or hand wash and then tumble dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ergonomic !! Great support
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised by this product. 1) Packaging was well done. Since its memory foam it has some weight to it, so it came vacuum sealed in a plastic bag to reduce weight and package size, and then placed in a reuseable cloth, zippered bag that can be used to store other items. 2) Fit nicely in a midsize SUV and also a sedan. The bottom as little rubber textured 'dimples' to it stays in place in the car seat, and it also has an elastic strap to secure it to the bottom of the seat. No need to reach under the seat to clip the strap, and it's designed to strap around the back. I thought this was well thought out. 3) It made the seating position for the driver much better. 4) Only one thing to be aware of is that if you are in a very cold climate area, the memory foam does become firmer/hard, and cold, so you may not feel comfortable. Otherwise a good product. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for the car
reviews.reviewText: I get hip and back pain when my hips are sitting lower than my knees and this cushion is perfect for just the right angle when driving so that I can drive without pain. It's sturdy and comfortable without having too much height. It gives just enough stability and height towards the back of the seat so driving no longer is uncomfortable for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good seat cushion for car
reviews.reviewText: Appears as pictured. Hard to buckle at first, then after using you are able to tighten it. This is important because the passenger seat air bags wouldn't engage until it was tight. Maybe just my Kia Telluride though. Better comfort than just the plain passenger seat. Elevates you some. Others who have ridden in that seat don't realize its there until I tell them. Still using it after 7 months. No wear or tear yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my car
reviews.reviewText: I originally got this to use at my work desk. My hips are starting to give me fits and I needed a little cushion between me and the chair. I chose these because they weren’t TOO thick and wouldn't cause my feet to dangle. (I’m short. 5’3”). It felt great. And I liked it so much, I ordered a 2nd one for my car. It stays in place without having to tie it on, which is great when I want to use the seat warmer. It’s easy to move. But it stays in place when I sit on it and it is preventing my hips from shifting and pinching when I make turns. And it helps reduce my hip pain on longer drives. It’s just what I needed at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not too tall (if that's what you are after), good cushioning, needed the sharp taper and this did not disappoint. I have other types for various applications, so no stranger to the general market offerings. Looked like what I wanted (per the above notes), and turned out to be true. Happy Customer.Fast shipping, properly packaged, good design and manufacturing. Happy Customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and comfort beyond expectations!
reviews.reviewText: While this seat cushion seems simple enough, it truly is nicely ergonomically shaped, just the right thickness not to change the seat position too much, and attaches with very secure webbing and clips.The quality appears to be outstanding - granted it’s only been a week of daily use - but I’m feeling very confident. This will last a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I drive 4 hours for work a couple of times a week. I was having horrible neck and back pain so I bought this and just gave it a try. This helps me on my drives. I will still need to remember to sit up straight but now my butt doesn't go numb on the drive. You end up sitting really tall so make sure to adjust your seat and mirrors when you use this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars seems to be helping quite a bit
reviews.reviewText: Seat is rather stiff but not uncomfortable. I am having less discomfort since using this seat in the car.
Very comfortable, stays in place and the memory foam forms to shape and size. If your vehicle does not offer enough support, especially on long trips, this is a back saver.

Always had severe leg pain and aches on a hour or more drive, but it was not the only leg issue I have. Went on a 5 hour drive recently and found tremendous leg improvement, very pleased with the seat.
